name: Domain of Blessing: Unyielding III
description: Those who are tough in spirit and body and who are not afraid of suffering pain shall gain the protection of this ritual site.\nThose who conquer the trial within have a chance to obtain precious artifacts, and with them, the power to achieve dreams yet far-off.
disorder: A backlash will occur when opponents hit a character protected by a shield, unleashing a shockwave originating at the attacking opponent's position that deals one instance of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 2s.
